name: Pumpkin Clicker (TheFlyingFinn)
description:
The game is very simple.

You are a pumpkin, and your goal is to "eat" all of the coins that will appear.  A single coin gives you 10 * Multiplier points ( If your multiplier is 2, it will give you 20 points).  You can buy upgrades for your multiplier. Each mushroom costs 10 points and it will increment the multiplier by 0.1 . A chestnut tree ,instead , costs 70 points but will boost your multiplier by 1. 

But, there is a catch. You will have to eat all coins before they become too many. If the amount of coins not grabbed is 5 or more you lose! That's simple , isn't it? No, it isn't! The game at the begging will be slow-paced, but  the more your score grows, the more coins will be spawned. It will be in your interest to spend those coins.  

Also, be aware that mines will kill you and end the game.

Good luck.

(Maximum pace is after 5000 points)

> > > > > > > > > >  How to move  < < < < < < < < < <

Use arrow keys or WASD.

> > > > > > > > > >  TIPS < < < < < < < < < <

To use all of your points in 1 click hold lshift. 

To buy more upgrades in consecution hold the left mouse button.

ATTENTION!

The game is still under development. Development will not go further after the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021 is concluded.
